snippet: About 70 percent of the 7,000 new companies that are likely to grow to the $1 billion-revenue mark by 2025 will come from emerging markets in Asia and elsewhere, a report by the McKinsey Global Institute estimated.
abstract: About 70 percent of the 7,000 new companies that are likely to grow to the $1 billion-revenue mark by 2025 will come from emerging markets in Asia and elsewhere, a report by the McKinsey Global Institute estimated.

headline.main: More Companies to Call Emerging Markets Home
headline.print_headline: Corporate World Shifting to Emerging Markets

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
